import MatchDetailComponent from"../components/matchDetailComponent";import MatchSmallComponent from"../components/matchSmallComponent";import"../styling/teamPage.css";import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Team(){const{teamName}=useParams();// {} is important otherwise it will go as [object object]
